item.title: Judge orders daily updates from Trump admin on getting Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was deported from the United States last month as the result of what prosecutors say was an administrative error.

item.title: Trump says 5 more law firms will provide $600 million total in free legal work for causes he supports
item.description: Trump said all five firms also agreed not to "engage in illegal DEI discrimination and preferences" and commit to "Merit-Based Hiring" as part of the ...

item.title: Senate Democrats ask SEC to probe Trump and others for potential market manipulation in tariff pause
item.description: The request comes as stock markets are experiencing high volatility as a result of Trump's tariff policy.

item.title: Trump advisor Peter Navarro hypes stocks a day after calling tariff-driven plunge 'no big deal'
item.description: The S&P 500 is down more than 12% since President Donald Trump reentered the White House and launched a trade war with China.

item.title: Supreme Court rules U.S. must facilitate return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia from El Salvador
item.description: The Trump administration argues that Kilmar Abrego Garcia is a member of the notorious MS-13 gang. The El Salvador native denies that claim.
